verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
You are Wonderful
You are wonderful ee
You are Wonderful ee
You are Wonderful ee
You are Wonderful ee
E ye E ye E ye

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Wonderful oh Lord (2ce)
Your Name is Wonderful
Wonderful oh Lord (2ce)

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
E juru enigwe ju uwa
Odighi onye di ka gi

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Mu gwo de
Baba mu gwo de
Jesu Mu gwo de
Jesu Sariki

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
Oba ara a
Olori aye
To fa aso ara bora
